title: Leftover curried turkey salad
ingredients: ['For the curry dressing', '80g soured cream', '2 tablespoons mango chutney', '1 tablespoon fresh lemon juice', '1 tablespoon honey', '1/4 teaspoon curry powder', 'For the salad', '550g leftover cooked turkey', '150g diced red pepper', '125g diced celery', '250g pineapple chunks', '180g chopped orange segments', '50g chopped spring onion']
